petNameAdd:
1) State Of Assam
    Advocate - Tapan Kumar Bhattacharya
resNameAdd:
1) Masmol Ali @ Sajmal Ali Sk.
    Advocate - Md Rofiqul Islam

business_details.Business: Accused Sajmal Ali Sk. @ Masmal Ali is present. Judgment ready and delivered in open court. Prosecution totally failed to bring home charge u/s 366(A) and section 4 of POCSO Act against the accused person Sajmal Ali Sk. @ Masmal Ali. Accordingly accused Sajmal Ali Sk. @ Masmal Ali is acquitted from the charge of section 366(A) and section 4 of POCSO Act and set at liberty.His bail bond shall remain stand for next 6 months u/s 437(A) Cr.P.C.Case is disposed of on contest.
